scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[service]@[remote_ip] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch];rport CSeq: 1 INVITE User-Agent: cati/1.0.1 From: "demo" <sip:CatiSoftPhone8@[local_ip]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] Call-ID: [call_id] Supported: 100rel,replaces To: <sip:[service]@W8-OPS-Marijn> Contact: "demo" <sip:CatiSoftPhone8@[local_ip]> Allow: INVITE,ACK,OPTIONS,BYE,CANCEL,SUBSCRIBE,NOTIFY,REFER,MESSAGE,INFO,PING,PRACK Content-Length: [len] Content-Type: application/sdp Max-Forwards: 70
v=0 o=- 1488983475 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=cati/1.0.1 c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio 5946 RTP/AVP 18 8 0 101 100 a=sendrecv a=rtpmap:18 G729a/8000/1 a=fmtp:18 annexb=no a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000/1 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000/1 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-16,32,36 a=rtpmap:100 NSE/8000 a=fmtp:100 192-193 a=ssrc:376824415 cname:Ogo7RE6mVx+VMwAMKWGjAA a=ptime:60 a=maxptime:240

ACK sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] CSeq: 1 ACK Content-Length: 0 Call-ID: [call_id] To: [service] <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number]

BYE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: [service] <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 BYE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0
